elements.name: panel1
elements.title: An apprentice regularly arrives at work a few minutes late.

elements.name: question1
elements.title: What is a sensible course of action for this breach of duty?
elements.correctAnswer: Warning, make up for missed time.

elements.name: panel2
elements.title: One day, a trainee is caught smoking pot by his boss during working hours, even though this is strictly forbidden in the company.

elements.name: question4
elements.title: What is a sensible course of action for this breach of duty?

elements.name: panel3
elements.title: An apprentice (hairdresser) has to clean his boss's car once a week.

elements.name: question2
elements.title: What is a sensible course of action for this breach of duty?
elements.correctAnswer: Discussion with vocational trainer > if unsuccessful > involve vocational training office

elements.name: panel4
elements.title: An apprentice is shouted at by her boss because of an unsatisfactory grade.

elements.name: question5
elements.title: What is a sensible course of action for this breach of duty?
elements.correctAnswer: Conversation > Understanding defeats > Working through school material
